bibl.title: The Sacred Crocodile of Juba II of Mauretania.
bibl.note: Introduction. - The sacred crocodiles of Sobek. - Cleopatra Selene. - Strabo of Amasia. - Conclusion. "When he dedicated a crocodile from Lake Nilides to the Temple of Isis in Caesarea, Juba II was alluding to the sacred crocodiles of the Sobek temples of the Fayum in Egypt."
bibl.seg: Jane Draycott, The Sacred Crocodile of Juba II of Mauretania.

Introduction. - The sacred crocodiles of Sobek. - Cleopatra Selene. - Strabo of Amasia. - Conclusion. "When he dedicated a crocodile from Lake Nilides to the Temple of Isis in Caesarea, Juba II was alluding to the sacred crocodiles of the Sobek temples of the Fayum in Egypt."
